00001 package liquibase.parser;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;

00005 import liquibase.exception.ChangeLogParseException;
00006 import liquibase.parser.xml.XMLChangeLogParser;
00007 
00008 import java.util.HashMap;
00009 import java.util.Map;
00010 
00011 public class ChangeLogParser {
00012 
00013     private Map<String, Object> changeLogParameters;
00014 
00015     public ChangeLogParser() {
00016         this.changeLogParameters = new HashMap<String, Object>();
00017     }
00018 
00019     public ChangeLogParser(Map<String, Object> changeLogParameters) {
00020         this.changeLogParameters = changeLogParameters;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public DatabaseChangeLog parse(String physicalChangeLogLocation, FileOpener fileOpener) throws ChangeLogParseException {
00024         return new XMLChangeLogParser().parse(physicalChangeLogLocation, fileOpener, changeLogParameters);
00025     }
